name: Edge (itch) (MAGES Institute of Excellence)
description:
Inspired by Mirror's Edge MAGES Institute of Excellence

Edge was developed over a 6 week period by DGT Student Vishal Tanwar as part of the Algorithms, Mathematics and Physics Module.

Controls

  • WASD for Movement
  • SPACE to Jump
  • AD to Wallrun
  • LMB to shoot your grappling gun
  • E to Interact
